content:
Hi all,

Just a quick note to introduce myself. A little late because I’ve already posted a couple of questions but better late than never.

I’m a long-time health and health-standards developer in Australia. I’m working on a few projects that are likely to use FHIR as a platform. Have worked with Grahame, Brian, Michael L, Brett E etc on various standards-related projects in the past including the Australian MyHealthRecord (PCEHR) and our local secure message delivery specs.

Mostly using Java and javascript.

Ciao,

Andrew
